title: Chicken Crispy
description: Chicken chunks, deep-fried and tossed in a fiery red marinade of garlic, red chilli, soy. A must-try starter!

title: Chicken Dragon
description: A hearty starter with deep-fried chicken chunks coated in a flavour-packed sauce with a strong flavor of garlic.

title: Chicken Sangrila
description: A flavor-packed dish with succulent chicken chunks coated in seasoned batter, deep-fried, and tossed in a spicy and thick Manchurian sauce.

title: Chicken Lollipop
description: Juicy chicken wings covered in a fiery red marinade of garlic, red chilli, soy and deep-fried.

title: Chicken Mongolian
description: A deliciously spicy dish with juicy chicken chunks coated in seasoned batter, deep fried, and tossed in a hot and spicy sauce.

title: Tomato Soup
description: A deliciously creamy and tangy soup made from fresh, ripe tomatoes.

title: Veg Manchow Soup
description: A slightly spicy and thick soup simmered in hot and spicy and topped with fried noodles.

title: Veg Hot and Sour Soup
description: A delectable hot and sour soup packed with the goodness of vegetables.

title: Veg Clear Soup
description: A flavour packed soup prepared from vegetables simmered in a seasoned vegetable stock.

title: Chicken Clear Soup
description: A flavour packed soup prepared by simmering chicken slivers in a seasoned stock.

title: Chicken Manchow Soup
description: A slightly spicy and thick soup simmered in hot and spicy flavors with chicken chunks, topped with fried noodles.

title: Chicken Hot and Sour Soup
description: A delectable yet tangy flavoured soup packed with chicken chunks - served with fried noodles.

title: Butterscotch Cake [500 grams]
description: Vanilla base layered with caramel blended vanilla cream and loaded with crunchy butter scotch nuts. Eggless cake

title: Choco Truffle Cake [500 grams]
description: Chocolate sponge layered with a delightful combination of chocolate truffle and chocolate cream. Eggless cake

title: Blueberry Cake [500 grams]
description: Delicious cake with sweet blueberry compote, served cold.

title: Pineapple Cake [500 grams]
description: Vanilla sponge, vanilla cream, loaded with juicy pineapple cubes and added pineapple crush to enhance flavour. Eggless cake

title: Chicken Dominator
description: Loaded with double pepper barbecue chicken, peri-peri chicken, chicken tikka & grilled chicken rashers

title: Non Veg Supreme
description: Supreme combination of black olives, onion, capsicum, grilled mushroom, pepper barbecue chicken, peri-peri chicken & grilled chicken rashers

title: Indi Tandoori Paneer
description: It is hot. It is spicy. It is oh-so-Indian. Tandoori paneer with capsicum, red paprika & mint mayo

title: Deluxe Veggie
description: Veg delight - onion, capsicum, grilled mushroom, corn & paneer

title: Chicken Golden Delight
description: Double pepper barbecue chicken, golden corn and extra cheese, true delight

title: Movie Marathons Specials (Non Veg)
description: Reg Pepper BBQ Chicken Pizza + Garlic Bread + Pepsi

title: Kiwi Juice
description: Made from the exotic kiwi fruit.

title: Mix Fruit Juice
description: A classy mixture of all the fresh fruits together.

title: Anaar Juice
description: Best in class Anaar juice made with real fruits and nothing else.

title: Mosambi Juice
description: Refreshing Mosambui Juice

title: Coconut juice
description: From the trees of coconut, this natural juice will make your day!
